attributes.additional_details: To support the doctors, nurses and healthworkers through this difficult time
attributes.background: I think that there should be an NHS themed 50p to honour our doctors, nurses and healthworkers fighting the deadly coronavirus. I'm sure if this gets enough signatures that this will happen

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Coins are manufactured and issued by the Royal Mint, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more here: https://www.royalmint.com/discover/uk-coins/coin-design-and-specifications/
